column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////H Town can be proud of this ramen spot! To be honest
column2: this ramen scene is kind of new for me
column3: but I am already a big fan! There is a very interesting option to take for free as much garlic as you want. But seriously
column4: how much the one can get? I am planning on tasting their sides
column5: which definitely look fabulous. The only negative point is that the restaurant is so tiny. I would be happy if it gets more spacious! The same about the parking.
